alert.note: Alert for St. Charles (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 26 at 9:02PM CDT until September 26 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN CALHOUN AND NORTH CENTRAL ST. CHARLES COUNTIES... At 901 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near St. Paul, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... O`Fallon, St. Charles, St. Peters, Bridgeton, Dardenne Prairie, St. Paul, Portage Des Sioux, Orchard Farms, Golden Eagle, and Kampville. This includes Interstate 70 in Missouri between exits 216 and 227. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
